name: MS271
desc: Retired in 2174, after 50 years of production the ship was seen obselete, though hobbyists and collectors still created demand for this shuttle.

name: MS272
desc: Replacing MS271 in the market, the MS272 was a more efficient and reliable shuttle, with a longer range and more cargo space.

name: MS273
desc: The MS273 was a short lived model, with only 2 years of production. It was a more luxurious model, with a larger passenger capacity and more comfortable seating.
